Articles.Content: I like computer games. So I have a lot of them. One of them is War Thunder. Ironically I have a War Thunder forum account too. In fact I'm going to do this very same thing on that forum. Talk about Warthunder vs Ksp etc
You need to,add a both...because i LOVE both!

> 
> You need to,add a both...because i LOVE both!

 I knew I needed too:wink:

It's enjoyable, but my internet connection is terrible...

Plus, the I-15 is, or at least was, way overpowered. I rammed a heavy bomber with it and survived...
I love it, but I'm terrible at it. I still can't take off without stalling and crashing in Realistic Battles...

> 
> I love it, but I'm terrible at it. I still can't take off without stalling and crashing in Realistic Battles...

50/50 chance of that happening to me.![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)
